title: INIGAN Car Phone Mount 3 in one Windshield Dashboard Air Vent Cell Phone Holder for iPhone Samsung Pixel Moto Nokia Black
features: [EASY INSTALLATION]:Easily secures your phone with one button quick release function.Adjustable 360 degree degree rotation for quick horizontal and vertical changes.
[UNIVERSAL FIT]:Holds devices up to 3.7 inches wide and up to 6,8 inch Phone case compatible.

[TELESCOPIC ARM]:The improved telescopic arm now extends from 4.9 inch up to 7 inch and pivots 270 degrees.This Car Mount's adjustable arm extends and contracts to provide users with a comfortable mobile experience
[ADJUSTABLE VIEWING ANGLE]:Can be attached to your air vent without blocking your sight.
[ONE HAND OPERATION]:Bringing you Convenient and Safe Experience While You Are Driving a Car.
Compatible phone models: IPHONE 12 PRO/ 12 PRO MAX/11 PRO/11 PRO MAX/ /X/XS/XR/8 PlusSamsung GALAXY S20/ S20 / S20 Ultra 5G/Note 10 Plus/
description: Introducing our revolutionary Air Vent Phone Holder, designed to provide you with an unparalleled smartphone mounting experience while driving. With its exceptional compatibility, this innovative product is a must-have accessory for any car owner. One of the standout features of our Air Vent Phone Holder is its exceptional compatibility with a wide range of smartphones. Whether you own an iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel, or any other popular smartphone brand, our phone holder is engineered to securely grip and hold your device with confidence. Its adjustable arms can accommodate various phone sizes, ensuring a perfect fit for your specific device. We understand that every car has different air vent designs, which is why we designed our phone holder to be universally compatible. It seamlessly fits onto horizontal, vertical, and round-shaped air vents, providing you with flexibility and convenience. The sturdy clamp mechanism ensures a tight grip, keeping your phone securely in place even during bumpy rides or sharp turns. Our Air Vent Phone Holder also features a user-friendly design. The one-touch operation allows you to effortlessly mount or remove your phone with a single hand, making it incredibly convenient and safe while driving. The 360-degree rotation capability enables you to adjust the phone's viewing angle to your preferred position, ensuring optimal visibility and reducing distractions. Durability and reliability are paramount in our product's design. We have used high-quality materials that ensure long-lasting performance, even in extreme temperatures. The holder's anti-slip padding protects your phone from scratches and provides additional stability during your journeys. Not only does our Air Vent Phone Holder offer exceptional compatibility and functionality, but it also enhances your overall driving experience. With your phone easily accessible and securely mounted, you can effortlessly use GPS navigation, answer hands-free calls.
